author: James Croot
title: Ramsay St lists on Airbnb
text:
Ramsay St lists on Airbnb JAMES CROOT Last updated 15:38, July 30 2015 Supplied 
The set of Neighbours has been listed on Airbnb, giving fans the chance to win a sleepover â€” and dinner with Dr Karl Kennedy. 
It's a dream come true for a Neighbours fan. A chance to sleepover on the Ramsay Street set. 
Airbnb has just announced a special listing which offers fans in Australia, New Zealand and the UK the opportunity to secure a night at the home of Australia's longest-running drama series. 
The winner and a guest will be hosted by Erinsborough doctor Karl Kennedy (Alan Fletcher) and handyman Kyle Canning (Chris Milligan), before walking down the famous street, reliving the drama at Harold's Store , The Waterhole and Lassiter's Lake . 
Then, they'll share in a sumptuous dinner with Fletcher and Milligan at the Willis family house, where juicy insider secrets and the behind-the-scenes news is promised. 
Fletcher is excited to share this amazing experience with an avid Neighbours fan. 
"This is a fantastic opportunity. A sleepover on the set is a truly unique experience, where guests will get to see where all the drama unfolds." 
Airbnb's Australia and New Zealand manager Sam McDonagh says the unique listing will "provide an unforgettable travel experience". 
For a chance to secure this stay, go to airbnb.com/neighbours . 
Neighbours screens in New Zealand at 6.30pm, weeknights on TV2.
